problem_text: In the figure, J M \cong P M and M L \cong P L. If m \angle P L J = 34, find m \angle J P M.
compact_text: In the figure, JM \cong PM and ML \cong PL. If m \angle PLJ = 34, find m \angle JPM.
annotat_text: In the figure, $ \overline{JM} \cong \overline{PM}$ and $ \overline{ML} \cong \overline{PL}$. If $m \angle PLJ=34$, find $m \angle JPM$.
